name: Robotomia
description:
You must cross the field with many robots as possible, one by one. 

You have limited items in the world, so use them carefully or the other robots will have no chance to escape!

Bruno S. Bataglin - Programmer

Leonardo S. Teixeira - Programmer

Arionildo Escouto - Programmer

Walter Oliveira - Level designer

Paola Magalhães - 2D artist
